CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Polythiophene ( PT ) materials have been proved to be promising donor materials as most PT materials exhibit high regioregularity for easy formation of well - organized active layer morphology , thus providing an auspicious way to develop new and efficient photovoltaic ( PV ) materials.

Let's think step by step.

1. Polythiophene ( PT )

The material name in the given paragraph is "Polythiophene (PT)". It is a type of organic semiconductor material that has been researched for its potential applications in photovoltaics. The abbreviation "PT" is used to refer to Polythiophene throughout the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Polythiophene (PT)

I have removed the irrelevant entities and only kept "Polythiophene (PT)" as it is the only material name clearly referred to in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
